value.title: Gaining Insights From Private Data Using Federated Learning
value.excerpt: Sid Roy is Manager of Machine Learning Engineering at Devron, a federated machine learning platform dedicated to unlocking the innovation and insight of data while preserving privacy. Learn more about this growing discipline and why it matters for the future of AI.

value.title: UNILAG Trains Youths on Coding, Robotics Programming

The programme is aimed at introducing young beginners to the field of robotics and progressively leadin them from basic concepts to actual work with robots.

value.title: Mary Barra confident in GM’s self-driving vehicle tech and goal to beat Tesla in EVs
value.excerpt: As we roll along in the third quarter of 2022, GM’s long-promised EV lineup is beginning to materialize and gain some serious momentum. The American automaker now has several EVs on the market and has even more in its production pipeline.

value.title: This Woman Created An AI System to Monitor Her Cat's Poop

value.title: Will Transit Agencies Fight Or Yield To The Self-Driving Revolution?

value.title: AI to Treat Women with Heart Problems
value.excerpt: Women are more likely than men to die from heart attacks. The causes are age disparities and the burdens of comorbidities, which makes risk assessment in women difficult.

value.title: How tech can accelerate the future of healthcare and social good
value.excerpt: Tech companies are teaming with independent innovators to solve pressing problems. A study released in the fall of 2020 suggested that the first nine months of the Covid-19 pandemic’s grip on the world spurred a decade’s worth of technological innovation.

value.title: This Mighty Brain Chip Is So Efficient It Could Bring Advanced AI to Your Phone

value.title: Nvidia, Dell, VMware add AI, zero-trust security into new data center package

value.title: MITs AI model can detect Parkinsons by tracking breathing patterns
value.excerpt: The U.S. Dina Katabi Dina Katabi, the Thuan and Nicole Pham Professor in the Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science (EECS) at MIT and principal investigator at MIT Jameel Clinic, and her team have developed an artificial intelligence model that can detect Parkinson’s just from reading a person’s breathing patterns.

value.title: AI Vs. AI: The Battle Against Human-Level Cognitive Threats
value.excerpt: One of the greatest threats that AI represents today is how it can be abused by cybercriminals, specifically in its capability to deceive people and trick them into engaging in actions with unwanted or underestimated consequences.

value.title: Tarci secures capital for AI designed to spot SMB sales leads
value.excerpt: Tarci, formerly Leadgence, uses AI -- specifically natural language processing -- to track and analyze small- and medium-sized businesses for potential sales opportunities.

value.title: Artificial intelligence and machine learning now integral to smart power solutions
value.excerpt: They help to improve efficiency and profitability for utilities. The utilities’ space is rapidly transforming today. It’s shifting from the conventional and a highly-regulated environment to a tech-driven market at a fast clip.
